name: test-update-after-api-rewrite
description: When updating tests after an API rewrite, audit each failing assertion for: (1) type name changes (Extension→ExtensionAPI), (2) method/property renames (event.name→event.toolName), (3) quote style differences in string matchers (single vs double), (4) expanded Set contents, (5) implicit vs explicit return patterns. The issue description in seeds is the canonical checklist — read it before writing any fix.
